text:
Hey <@U01H2CECNAE>

I hope you are having a wonderful weekend!

We are facing an issue when we create a new contact and a new deal through Zapier, it shows the original source in the contact card as "Offline source". (Calendly)

In case someone arrived through Google, Facebook, Instagram or other channels it shows the source which is great but in this case we are loosing the original source that super critical for us to measure from where the lead has arrived.

We talked with HS support and they were explaining that we need to have some code that will solve this issue.

Have you ever heard about it? Do you think that you have the solution to solve it?

We would love to know more than that so we would be able have like a 'pixel' which track how the contacts were created.

Kindly, let me know if you know how to assist!
For example: a contact that was created via Zapier
